name: 蕭名宏
objective:
先修課程:微積分或負責教授同意
常微分方程式，線性常微分方程式，拉普拉氏轉換，線性代數及矩陣。
schedule:
1　　First-Order Differential Equations
2　　First-Order Differential Equations
3　　First-Order Differential Equations
4　　Second-Order Differential Equations
5　　Second-Order Differential Equations
6　　Second-Order Differential Equations
7　　Series Solutions
8　　Series Solutions
9　　Laplace Transforms
10　　Laplace Transforms
11　　Vectors and Vector Spaces
12　　Vectors and Vector Spaces
13　　Matrices and Systems of Linear Equations
14　　Matrices and Systems of Linear Equations
15　　Determinants
16　　Matrix Eigenvalue Problems
17　　Matrix Eigenvalue Problems
18　　期末考
scorePolicy: 課堂表現10%, 三次期中考60%(每次各20%), 期末考30%
materials:
教科書及參考書目
Advanced Engineering Mathematics, by Ersin Kreyszig, 10th edition, 歐亞書局
